ques: The teacher will ________ the students on how to perform the experiment.
The Prime ________ addressed the nation in a televised speech.
A yoga instructor needs to be ________ to demonstrate different poses.
The ________ of this disease has increased in recent years.
The artist's painting is very ________ and open to interpretation.
I ________ you're coming to the party since you RSVPed.
The new software update will ________ the performance of your device.
Please ________ the file to your email and send it to me.
Please use ________ to secure the package.
Team members need to ________ closely to achieve the project's goals.
The two companies decided to ________ on a joint venture.
Don't ________ that everyone knows the rules; explain them.
Please ________ me on how to use this new software.
The company offers ________ work hours for its employees.
Exercise can ________ your physical fitness and health.
I need to ________ this document to the application form.
The ________ of Health announced new healthcare policies.
You can record the interview on ________ for reference.
The ________ of the research paper summarizes its main points.
The report analyzed the ________ of accidents in the area.
The cable is damaged; we need to use electrical ________.
We aim to ________ the quality of our customer service.
He was ________ed to follow a strict diet after surgery.
They agreed to ________ with each other in resolving the issue.
The foreign ________ is responsible for diplomatic relations.
It can be difficult to understand ________ concepts in philosophy.
He didn't answer, so I can only ________ he's busy.
Being ________ in your approach can lead to creative solutions.
There has been a high ________ of flu cases this season.
You can easily ________ the photo to your message.
________ing with others can lead to better results.
She used a piece of ________ to mark her page in the book.
We should not ________ guilt without evidence.
Adding spices can ________ the flavor of the dish.
The book's ________ cover design caught my attention.
The manual will ________ you on assembling the furniture.
He forgot to ________ the receipt to the expense report.
The study examined the ________ of crime in urban areas.
The material is very ________, allowing for various uses.
She met with the Education ________ to discuss school reforms.
The coach will ________ the team on their game strategy.
It's important to ________ with colleagues in a workplace.
His speech was full of ________ ideas and theories.
Make sure to ________ the address label to the package.
The detective sealed the crime scene with ________.
The hospital recorded a lower ________ of infections.
I would never ________ to know everything about the topic.
The ________ of Finance presented the budget to parliament.
His ________ schedule allows him to adapt to changes easily.
Education can ________ a person's knowledge and skills.
